name: Work From Home
description:
Inspired by recent events, try your best to keep working on virtual meetings while keeping your kids away from hazards.  The more time your kid spends next to a hazard, the more you go insane.  The longer you wait to answer that meeting call, the more you go insane.  How long can you last?

Special thanks to our families for their patience and inspiration!
